data.title: Simcere Pharmaceutical Group Ltd.
meta_keywords: Jiangsu Quanyi Biological Technology Stock Co.
data.meta_description: Simcere is a research and development-driven Chinese pharmaceutical company with a State Key Lab for Translational Medicine and Innovative Drug Development. It is committed to delivering highly effective treatments to patients. Simcere achieves this by focusing its efforts on the therapeutic areas of oncology, neurology, inflammation/immunology diseases and more. Simcere Pharmaceutical Group Ltd., CMOCRO, PharmaCircle, Company, Company Detail, Jiangsu Quanyi Biological Technology Stock Co., Ltd, https://en.simcere.com/, No.699-18, Xuanwu Avenue  Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, 210042
data.text: Simcere is a research and development-driven Chinese pharmaceutical company with a State Key Lab for Translational Medicine and Innovative Drug Development. It is committed to delivering highly effective treatments to patients. Simcere achieves this by focusing its efforts on the therapeutic areas of oncology, neurology, inflammation/immunology diseases and more.
